TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SigningOutEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks Read the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SigningOutEventArgs.IsIPInitiated%2A> property in an event handler to determine whether the sign-out was initiated by the IP (a sign-out clean-up request message was received by the RP), or whether the sign-out was initiated by the relying party (RP).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(bool isIPInitiated) cil managed

Docs.param: if sign-out was requested by the IP; otherwise, .
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class by using a value that specifies whether sign-out was requested by the identity provider (IP).

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SigningOutEventArgs.IsIPInitiated%2A> property is set to the value of the `isIPInitiated` parameter.

Docs.summary: Gets a that indicates sign-out was initiated by the identity provider (IP).
Docs.value: A that has its <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SigningOutEventArgs.IsIPInitiated%2A> property set .
Docs.returns: A that has its <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SigningOutEventArgs.IsIPInitiated%2A> property set .

Docs.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether sign-out was initiated by the identity provider (IP) via a WS-Federation sign-out clean-up message (“wsignoutcleanup1.0”).
Docs.value: if sign-out was initiated by the IP; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks In an event handler, you can use the IsIPInitiated property to determine whether the sign-out was initiated by the IP (a sign-out clean-up request message was received by the RP), or whether the sign-out was initiated by the relying party (RP).

Docs.returns: if sign-out was initiated by the IP; otherwise, .

Docs.summary: Gets a that indicates sign-out was initiated by the relying party (RP).
Docs.value: A that has its <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SigningOutEventArgs.IsIPInitiated%2A> property set .
Docs.returns: A that has its <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SigningOutEventArgs.IsIPInitiated%2A> property set .
